nginx负载均衡简单配置

Dec 14, 2017

最简单的nginx负载均衡


worker_processes 4;
events{
	worker_connections 1024;
}
http{
	upstream firsttest {
		server 111.13.103.91 weight=3;
		server 111.13.179.222;
	}
	server{
		listen 8080;
		location / {
			proxy_pass http://firsttest;
		}
	}
}
